review: They need more apps, but they'll come. It works great for Hulu, Netflix, etc. I just wish there was a player that played from a network drive and casted. Android's default player casts fine but doesn't stream from a network source. Once that's possible (likely through another player that uses Chromecast that some other developer will need to build, I don't think Google will), then this thing will be a big time win and replacement for HTPCs.

review: Chromecast is not a bad device, but I do feel that it needs more service. The setup was sort of difficult as I tried using my laptop and desktop to have the HDMI dongle to connect to my wireless. I end up downloading the Chromecast app for my android device and was able to connect Chromecast to my wifi - what I found out is that is the device temporarily disconnects you from the internet which is the reason why I was unable to use my desktop and laptop. Using my phone was much easier as when my wireless was dropped from the android, I still had connectivity, my 4G.As far as the apps goes, Google did provide more apps to this device since my initial purchase back in November which are:  VEVO, Red Bull.TV, Songza, PostTV, Viki, Revision 3, RealPlayer Clound, Plex, Avia, and BeyondPod. Some of these applications require subscription to the services. With all the apps that are compatible to Chromecast, one major dislike was the fact that in order to view what's on my screen, I have to download the application to my device whether that be my phone or tablet and stream them. I'm used to the Roku way where all of its built-in apps are on the device itself, I may have to download it from Roku's store but it's on Roku's device and not mines.Google Cast - I haven't truthfully used it, but when I did it was horrible video streaming to the point it would disconnect and maybe it was because of bad network connectivity in the house. I am just now starting to use the "Index of C:\users" (file:///C:/users) or as they say, anything in the folder you can stream to your Chromecast. There is also some lagging issues with this dongle as well.
